title: Sunny day, Funny Day
text:
We select a place in the terrace, on Puerto Madero "beach" front...
We order some Aperol Spritz appetizer....
We order a bottel of delicious Malbec...
We order a big and succulent Bife Chorizo....
The day was a sunny day with plenty light and energy....
The service has been incredile...
Location and design at the top level
The price a little hight...
At the end of this expierience we decide to repeat it. ... Too funny day

title: I'm a King
text: Duino is a small town with 2 castles in front of the mediterranean see. The oldest has a bad path to reach the ruins, but it is complitely safe.Below it there's the rock of Dama Bianca, that look incredible from the see, asher own fantastic history. Inside the new castle ther´s a museum of historic art. If you are looking for a special wedding location, you can hire it to celebrate your wonderfull moments. The bunker is something incredible that take you back to the first and second world wars. I really enjoied the expirience.

title: Do not miss it
text: Well, we has been invited by a friend of us and we went here with a lot of hungry!! We were in 6 and we order so many dishes!! All incredible, great list of wine. New taste, new place and new expirience. Service vas really good. We had drink a Roca MAdre wine wich has been a superb selection. A malbec with the freshness of pinot noir. Do not miss it

title: One of the best Meat Restaurant in BA
text: This has been an axcellent choice. We went here invited by an Argentino, wich said us : I love you and if you wonna eat parrilla, I show you a great place !! Well , the place is not a luxury place or 3 star michelin , but the service is wonderfull and the meat is deliciouse. Each dish is good enough for 2 people. The teatst is incredible and the waiters are really gentely. Of course, the place will appear fabulous if you go with a good number of good friends!!

title: Good and comfortable
text: First time I have been here. Service is really good, rooms and space are new and comfortable. The breakfast is good. Location is really good as well as the security alla around. Usually I go in a 5 star Hotel and this Hotel, that has a lower calification, really surprise me!!

title: This is the place !
text: If you go to Athens, you must vist Plaka! For the History but at the same time for shopping and lunch or dinner things!! Efharistò Athens

title: ZEUS MODE
text: We went in august! 2pm ! 35 celsius!! Was incredible the power of sensation, the ancient magnificents, the perfection of the art and the deep of the culture!! This walk is easy and the cost of the entrance is cheep. You can buy the ticket at the entrance or by web (of course with web's option you can avoid a long line). Of course your picture or selfie will be beautifull!!!!

title: Relax! No noise!! I'm happy
text: Well, we arrive in Athens around mid august. We choice Grand Hyatt first of all because is a Hyatt that means quality, and second for the dimension of the rooms. Price was good enough too. The location is not to far by the centre. 15 min by foot and 3 min by taxi. The taxi cost is cheep (between 5 and 10 euro each trip). The external /perimetral environment in not good, but at the end this will not affect your holidays. Breakfast good, lobby good. Owesome the entrance room's door!!! because are using a antinoise/soundproof doors. !!! When you are in your room, you will not listen neither the service with vacum cleaner!!!

title: The best in South America
text: In my opinion, LATAM is the best in South America. Plenty destinations, pretty good machine, but sometimes the 319 or 320 has poor space for the legs. For the medium long flight I suggest to verify if it is available a 787 or similar. Punctuality is one of their strenght. The cost for the flights are a little bit higher of other companies, but in my opinion the punctuality and availability is all I need for my best comfort and to have a good holiday!!

title: Paint Paint Paint
text: This is a really good museum. Just colonial pintures. The building is an historic one and the location is in the bohemian block of Barranco.

title: Museum+Dinner=ArtCusine
text: No one similar to this en Lima! You can visit the private precolombian museum, which is one of the best in Lima. One room is dedicated to the sexiest precolombian crete pots... At the end of your visual expierience, you can relax yourself in the restaurant, Café del Museo. The location is superb! the terrace is arounded with flowers, has sharme and a romantic athmosphere of colonial style. GO!

title: Surprise choice
text: This restaurant has been a surprice choice! We went there just to try a new restaurant, something different from the tipical and well known vip names.... At the end of the dinner, we were really happy. Good service, different menu adeguate prices. Try it with your good best friends!!

title: oh my gosh. I'm in paradise
text: We went here during our greek holidays!! The island is great. the hotel a paradise!! Location , food, service, rooms, everything spectacular!! Additionally you can find a private church for your special and mad greek wedding !!

title: Best sunset of the island
text: We went here before sunset!! We see it from the top roof of the church!! Imbeliveble!! You have to do some step but at the end you can enjoy the life!!

title: Surprise the hotspot
text: This place is incredible. In the right side of the beach there is an hot spot. When you lay down for your relax and to take your sun you can expirence the hot sand on your back...(the right hot).

title: On the moon
text: This place is very easy to reach. You can hire a scooter or a quad and in 30 min you will be there. 2 minutes by foot and bang! A wonderfull place where you can swim in the mediterranea see, snap incrediles pictures etc etc. Do not miss it

title: Do not miss it
text: Really good, great view, great service and all the food was always fresh and delicious!!! Fully recommended!!

title: Special place 4 your instagram
text: Is one of the best place in the world where you can snap an incredible picture! Of course you can find a lot of different things like restaurants, shops, tourists, etc etc.. Be relaxed and take your time!!!

title: Moon, Stars and Passion
text: Great expirience in this luxury restaurant. Great location, and the food was the best. Nothwitstanding that, the best of the night has been the wine and my wonderfull wife!!

title: Best Sunset
text: This Hotel is one of the best in Oia. The Villas are very spacious and comfortables. 5 star service, wonderfull private pool and and a incredible sunset. The hotel is not located in the caldera, but I can assure that is much better....less tourist and more quiet!! Full recomended.
place: Santo Maris Oia Luxury Suites & Spa

title: Oh my Gosh
text: Imposible to be there and keep your mouth closed!! Really impressive. Historic centre is safe, with a lot of things to do.
